title: Pivot TIG up 2021 Point steel hardtail DJ Bike for frequent flyers w/ adjustable stays
content:
Pivot Cycles have reintroduced the steel frame Point dirt jump bike for 2021, with adjustable rear dropouts and a complete geometry refresh. Don’t worry, there is no actual Pivot Point. It’s still a hardtail running a 26″ wheelset. Let’s take a closer look at this reinvention of a modern classic ridden to fame by Aaron […]
